days.title: Who We Are Is What We Leave Behind: The Joy of Dumpster Diving
days.description: You can’t get rid of 2000-ton garbage problem until you know what the garbage is. Subaru recycling guru Denise Coogan gets up close and personal with Grand Teton’s trash.
days.shortdesc: Subaru recycling guru Denise Coogan gets up close and personal with Grand Teton’s garbage.

days.title: Episode 3: Grand Teton
days.description: The second of our Zero-Landfill Initiative pilot parks, Subaru experts travel to Grand Teton National Park to begin assessing how to reduce the park’s 2000 tons of annual trash generation.
days.shortdesc: Subaru experts head to the second Zero-Landfill Initiative pilot park, Grand Teton, to tackle its 2000 ton garbage dilemma.

days.title: Subaru Earns Spot on Prestigious Rodale 100
days.description: Rodale, the influential publisher of healthy living magazines such as Men's Health, Women's Health, Runner's World and Organic Health, has included Subaru on their prestigious Rodale 100; a list honoring companies, people, products and organizations for their outstanding work to positively impact the world
days.shortdesc: Rodale 100 Recognizes Subaru for its Environmental Leadership.

days.title: Backpacker Magazine and Subaru Visit Over 40 National Parks
days.description: To celebrate the 100th anniversary of America's amazing National Parks, Subaru partners with Backpacker Magazine by sending a pair of photographers and filmmakers to explore the top 100 reasons people love these priceless places. While on this trip of a lifetime, Aidan and Madison are learning from park rangers, and talking to park visitors regarding zero-landfill practices and efforts documenting the entire process in a series of charming and informative videos.
days.shortdesc: Subaru and Backpacker Magazine celebrate National Park Centennial with the NPS100, a marathon visit of over 40 parks.

days.title: Episode 4: Denali
days.description: Subaru environmental experts travel to “The Great One,” Denali National Park — the third and final pilot park in our landmark Zero-Landfill Initiative — to try and tackle the unique challenges presented by Alaska's remoteness.
days.shortdesc: Episode 4 of our landmark zero-landfill series features Subaru experts visiting the incredible Denali National Park.

days.title: Mollie Boyer: There Is No Away
days.description: Mollie Boyer, Alaska's recycling pioneer, reminds us that all the stuff we've been throwing away all these years is actually a valuable resource, and should be treated as such. #DontFeedTheLandfills
days.shortdesc: Alaska recycling pioneer Mollie Boyer reminds us that everything is a resource, and should be treated that way. #DontFeedTheLandfills
